songs.title: Someone You Loved
songs.author: Lewis Capaldi
songs.content:
[Intro]
C   G   Am  F

[Verse 1]
C                          G                              Am     F
I'm going under and this time I fear there's no one to save me
C                        G                                Am        F
This all or nothing really got a way of driving me crazy
C                          G                              Am       F
I need somebody to heal, somebody to know, somebody to have
C                          G                              Am       F
Somebody to hold, it's easy to say, but it's never the same

[Pre-Chorus]
Am                        F                    C              G
I guess I kinda liked the way you numbed all the pain

[Chorus]
C                    G                    Am                F
Now the day bleeds into nightfall, and you're not here
C                    G                         Am              F
To get me through it all, I let my guard down, and then you pulled the rug
C                    G                    Am                F
I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved

songs.title: Wonderwall
songs.author: Oasis
songs.content:
[Intro]
Em7  G  D  C

[Verse 1]
Em7                G              D                C
Today is gonna be the day that they're gonna throw it back to you
Em7               G                D                   C
By now you should've somehow realized what you gotta do
Em7               G           D                    C                G    C
I don't believe that anybody feels the way I do about you now

[Verse 2]
Em7               G             D                 C
Backbeat the word was on the street that fire in your heart is out
Em7               G               D                     C
I'm sure you've heard it all before but you never really had a doubt
Em7               G           D                    C                G    C
I don't believe that anybody feels the way I do about you now

[Pre-Chorus]
C         D         Em7
And all the roads we have to walk are winding
C         D              Em7
And all the lights that lead us there are blinding
C         D         G      Em7      C
There are many things that I would like to say to you
D        G
But I don't know how

[Chorus]
C      Em7    G        Em7
Because maybe, you're gonna be the one that saves me
C    Em7  G     Em7
And after all, you're my wonderwall

songs.title: La Vie En Rose
songs.author: Édith Piaf
songs.content:
[Verse 1]
C                    Em              F                 G
Quand il me prend dans ses bras, il me parle tout bas
C                    Em              F        G        C
Je vois la vie en rose, il me dit des mots d'amour

[Verse 2]
C                    Em              F                 G
Des mots de tous les jours, et ça me fait quelque chose
C                    Em              F        G        C
Il est entré dans mon cœur, une part de bonheur

[Chorus]
F                    C               F                 C
Dont je connais la cause, c'est lui pour moi, moi pour lui
F                    C               Dm       G        C
Dans la vie, il me l'a dit, l'a juré pour la vie

songs.title: Mais t'es pas là
songs.author: Exemple Français
songs.content:
Capo 2

[Intro]
G  C  C  D

[Verse 1]
            Em
Je suis une cruche,
              Am
percée de plus,
            D
j'ai la peau craquelée
          Em
depuis toi, desséchée
               Em
Quand vient la lune
             Am
et le vent frais,
        D
par habitude,
                       Em
j'te cherche sur le canapé

[Verse 2]
                     G
Dieu qu'elle est loin
              Am
la nuit de liesse
           D
où j'ai trouvé ta main
                  Em
bien avant la tristesse
            G
Tu me traquais,
            Am
tu m'avais vu,
          D
tu m'as pris pour collier
                      G
et mon cou tu l'as tendu (pas là)

[Chorus]
G                           Am
mais t'es pas là, mais t'es où ? (pas là)
                            D
mais t'es pas là, mais t'es où ? (pas là)
                            Em
mais t'es pas là, mais t'es où - - - -
          G
mais t'es où ? (pas là)  mais t'es pas là
          Am
mais t'es où ? (pas là) mais t'es pas là
          D                  Em
mais t'es où où où mais t'es où où où
